'''"Scholar's Weariness"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Scholar's Weariness" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Pine Wood = 4
|Blue Dye = 4
|sort = Pine Wood;Blue Dye
}}

==Furnishing Sets==
{{Craft Usage}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* Despite being an indoor furnishing, "Scholar's Weariness" can be placed outdoors by using the [[Iter Ad Astra Abyssosque]] gift set.
